channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 92b92042-07d9-4307-87f7-36a593fc5850
Display name: Azure File Sync Administrator
Description: Provides full access to manage all Azure File Sync (Storage Sync Service) resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/92b92042-07d9-4307-87f7-36a593fc5850?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 754c1a27-40dc-4708-8ad4-2bffdeee09e8
Display name: Azure File Sync Reader
Description: Provides read access to Azure File Sync service (Storage Sync Service).
Link: https://management.azure.com/754c1a27-40dc-4708-8ad4-2bffdeee09e8?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 88366f10-ed47-4cc0-9fab-c8a06148393e
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Hosted Control Planes Cluster API Provider
Description: Enables permissions to allow cluster API to manage nodes, networks and disks for OpenShift cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/88366f10-ed47-4cc0-9fab-c8a06148393e?api-version=2022-04-01
